example.text: Wall Street to give it a new moniker

example.name: autogen2
example.text: has earned the Mitsubishi group the dubious moniker of `` seisho , '' literally government-business , a title that has the pejorative connotation of doing the government 's bidding , but also suggests the clout inherent in maintaining such close ties
